menu.description: Chicken that has been carefully dried to a moisture level of 10%.The protein content is 65% and 12% fat level. Fried together with rice grains while monitoring heat levels
Slightly ripe plantain is deep fried in vegetable oil of low cholesterol content. Served along side chicken and tomato sauce. Plantain can be replaced with fried potato.
Well cooked fufu corn wrapped with natural leaves, vegetables and tasty roasted chicken
White and red garri with delicious eru soup with fried spicy snails. Prepared using natural palm oil with zero cholesterol levels
Boiled plantain and ndole prepared with vegetable oil. Can be served with meat or chicken
Delicious pepper soup goat meat prepared with yam with high protein content and carbohydrate for energy
Prepared with coco-yams which contains high carbohydrate content , natural palm oil with zero cholesterol and beef with high protein content
Pounded coco-yams and bananas, well cooked and served with yellow soup made with natural spicy ingredients.
Well prepared rice grains and Delicious tomato sauce containing green pepper and  lettuce. Served with chicken or cow meat
Tasty Beef prepared with tomato sauce and natural spices. Can be served with rice, plantain or yam.

reviews.name: manager echo back
reviews.review: They are the best eating house in the city of douala. Their customer service is very polite and welcoming

reviews.name: sidwan
reviews.review: Delicious! . Food is very tasty and their delivery time is as quick as lightening

reviews.name: vivan
reviews.review: As somone who hates eating outside, i tried their pepper soup goat meat and it was one in a million. So for that, i give them a plus

reviews.name: maxwel
reviews.review: i ate with them last week and their meal was super delicious
